story.text: LONDON Jan 2 European shares hit their highest level in more than 5-1/2 years on Tuesday, starting 2007 on a strong note after gains in Asia. The FTSEurofirst 300 Index .FTEU3 rose 0.7 percent to a peak of 1,494.6 points, its highest intraday level since May 22, 2001.
story.title: european stocks hit fresh 5 - 1 / 2 year peak
